name: IRIS (artofomi)
description:
Historically Accurate Game Jam 4

"IRIS"'
Play as Iris the goddess of the rainbow as she battles the undead in the River Styx.
Use your Rainbow Dash to defeat enemies. The more you defeat, the higher your score.

Inspired by the painting of Iris by Guy Head.  Iris is carrying the water of River Styx for the gods to swear by.

CONTROLS:
D / Right Arrow:
Move forward
Moving forward gradually raises your score

A / Left Arrow:
Move back
While walking back lowers your score

W / Up Arrow:
Jump
Jumping over enemies will raise your score

S / Down Arrow (Hold):
Refill water
Refilling water will raise your score

Water can only be filled one at a time but will allow you to use Rainbow Dash which can destroy enemies

Tap D / Right Arrow twice to dash forward,

Hold the D / Right Arrow to continuously dash

When you have a water fill, you can destroy enemies by dashing into them

You can still dash without a water fill but if an enemy hits you, you will lose score

Tap A / Left Arrow to dash back

Dashing back will lower your score

Esc to pause
